daily_activities: Sightseeing: Visit the Et'hem Bey Mosque and the Skanderbeg Square in Tirana
Shopping: Explore the Tirana Market for local handicrafts and souvenirs
Dining: Enjoy traditional Albanian cuisine at a local restaurant
Hiking: Hike to the top of Mount Dajt for breathtaking views of Tirana
Adventure Sports: Go paragliding or zip-lining in the Dajt Mountains
Nightlife: Experience the vibrant nightlife of Tirana at the Blloku district
Sightseeing: Visit the ancient city of Butrint, a UNESCO World Heritage Site
Museums: Explore the Butrint Museum to learn about the history and archaeology of the site
Dining: Try some fresh seafood at a local restaurant in Saranda
Hiking: Hike to the Blue Eye (Syri i Kaltër), a natural spring with stunning scenery
Adventure Sports: Go rafting or kayaking in the Vjosa River
Shopping: Visit the town of Gjirokastër for its historic architecture and local shops
Sightseeing: Explore the historic town of Berat, with its well-preserved Ottoman architecture
Museums: Visit the Berat Museum to learn about the history and culture of the town
Dining: Enjoy traditional Albanian cuisine and wine in Berat
Adventure Sports: Go hiking or mountain biking in the Accursed Mountains
Sightseeing: Visit the stunning Valbona Valley and the village of Valbona
Nightlife: Relax and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere of the Valbona Valley
Shopping: Visit the Grand Bazaar in Tirana for last-minute shopping and souvenirs
Dining: Enjoy a farewell dinner at a traditional Albanian restaurant
Sightseeing: Take a stroll around the city and reflect on the amazing experiences had in Albania

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to a major European hub like Istanbul or Dubai, then connect to a flight to Tirana International Airport (TIA) in Albania. Possible airlines include Turkish Airlines, Emirates, or Lufthansa.
